meaningMnemonic: Whenever all the <radical>feathers</radical> start <radical>stand</radical>ing, you know it's time for <kanji>the next</kanji> day. Once the day comes to its end, all feathers start standing up like clockwork.
readingMnemonic: With <kanji>the next</kanji> day approaching and all feathers standing up, you get ready to drink your usual liter of <reading>yolk</reading> (よく). Yes, you heard that right.
